DOC.brief_title: Effects Black Soy Peptide Supplementation Blood Pressure
DOC.detailed_description: Trial participant include men woman age 30 65 year average systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) 130 159 mmHg , average diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) 80 99 mmHg , , base average six measurement two screen visit . Participants supply 84 pouch placebo ( casein ) black soy peptide ( 3 pouches/day ) 0-week 4-week visit . Test group subject receive pouch contain black soy peptide ( 4.5 g/day total soy peptide 8 week ) . The control group receive pouch contain casein similar appearance black soy peptide tablet . During intervention , instruct study participant continue current food intake pattern lifestyles total energy intake energy expenditure would constant course trial . Participants bring back unconsumed pouch 4- 8-week follow-up visit . The dietitian counted number return pouch , use assess participant ' adherence assign intervention .
